name: Pokémon Turbo Cyan Beta 1.0
description:
Explore the new but familiar world of The Legend of TyranitarTube series in the format of the Pokémon games! This takes place 20 years after the events in part 3 and in this game you don’t even need to play the other 3 parts to understand the story! This is a new story that will re-introduce some of the old points from the first TLOTT story, like you're  just hearing of it for the first time. More new Pokémon have started make an appearance in the region along with even more new Transgene Pokémon discovered by Professor Ray, Dynamax Dens have now emerged and along with an ally, you can take down the Dynamax Pokémon that live in there and get a rare Pokémon with some useful items. New Dynamax Energies have been discovered that change more stats of the Pokémon besides just HP! New people and adventures await!

(IMPORTANT!!!): Everything you see here is subject to change! Things like the current new Pokémon/Trainer sprites are temporary and will be recreated from scratch to match the quality of the rest of the already existing sprites. Also you can't search for the area of where to find a certain Pokémon in the Pokédex since when coding the areas in, the game crashes when opening the Pokédex . So for some old Pokémon they'll have their preexisting areas set. This will be fixed in future updates! Also there may be a few typos inbound..

This is a non-profit Fan Game! All materials used to help make this game belong to their original creators! Please support them by checking out their Channels, Art, Work and Games!

Music made by Christoph Jakob: Iceburg - Mario & Luigi inspired Music, Moss Plains - Mario & Luigi inspired Music, Main Theme - Mario & Luigi inspired Music, Acquired! - Mario & Luigi inspired Music (YT Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWSzGo6QlFxt68mxh44rlMA)

Music made by Quicksilverquinn: Champion Theme, Brian's Theme, Dojo Theme, Dojo Master Battle, Waterfall Mountain, Pokémon Red & Blue rescue team: Town remix (YT Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKyY4Cvw3lMWDaTsjMrpu6w )

Music made by Zame: Violet/Olivine City: Remastered ► Pokémon Heart Gold & Soul Silver, Castelia City (Night Time): Remastered ► Pokémon Black & White, Ilex Forest/Union Cave: Remastered ► Pokémon Heart Gold & Soul Silver, Azalea Town (Sevii Islands: 4 & 5): Remastered ► Pokémon Fire Red & Leaf Green,  Elm's Pokémon Lab: Remastered ► Pokémon Heart Gold & Soul Silver, Wild Pokémon Capture: Remix ► Pokémon Ranger: Shadows of Almia (YT Channle: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKKKbeAhjKYJfOy5Opg8lcQ)

Music made by marionose1: "Have A Nice Talk" - Bowser's Inside Story 3DS (Fan Music), Yoshi Mountain (Inside Bowser) - Partners In Time x Bowser's Inside Story(Video was removed right before the beta was finished! Sads... ) (YT Channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCooPyRlGvv2td_N_rDLKdyA)

Other music came with Pokémon Essentials!

Addition Resources Used:  X/Y Sprite Project, Sun/Moon Sprite Project, Location Signposts with Background Image (Made by PurpleZaffre), RGSS Linker and FmodEx Script (Made by Nuri Yuri), Emote Animations from Spriter's Resource (Ripped from HG&SS by Lemon), Mid Battle Dialogue/ Scripted Battles (Made by Golisopod User)

New Original Pokémon and Trainer Sprites Made by: Text 2O6, Quicksilverquinn and P.Diddly! Also the Panplug front sprite was made by Kamionero on Deviant Art!
